feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: W 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
